trans-unit.source: Represents an entity container in a conceptual model.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> is a logical grouping of entity sets and association sets.
On the conceptual level, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer> class represents a container that will be mapped to a database object in the storage metadata schema.
In the storage level, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer> class represents a description of the table and/or key relationships that persist data for applications built on the model.
For more information about the entity containers in a conceptual model, see [Entity Containers (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9afa762f-59b8-4a70-b76d-89d90760144c).
Gets a list of entity sets and association sets that this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> includes.

A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1"></xref> object that contains a list of entity sets and association sets that this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> includes.
Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
Specifies a collection of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref> elements.
Each function contains the details of a stored procedure that exists in the database or equivalent CommandText that is mapped to an entity and its properties.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref> elements.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the entity set.
The name of the entity set that is searched for.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object that represents the entity set that has the specified name.
Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the relationship set.
The name of the relationship set that is searched for.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object that represents the relationship set that has the specified name.
Gets the name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
The name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
Returns the name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
The name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the entity set.
The name of the entity set that is searched for.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
When this method returns, contains an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object.
If there is no entity set, this output parameter contains null.
`true` if there is an entity set that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the relationship set.
The name of the relationship set that is searched for.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object.
`true` if there is a relationship set that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
